--- layout: datasheet title: SensorFleet Event Exporter Instrument description: A simple HTTP API for exporting events to external systems. ---

Overview

Event Exporter Instrument provides a simple and lightweight HTTP API for external system to retrieve events from the SensorFleet event pipeline.

The API supports freely defined event search terms and standard pagination features like limit and offset.

Event Exporter is good for certain applications. If you need more features such as pushing events directly to an external system, see
Log Forwarder Instrument,

Use Cases

Event Export from SensorFleet to external system

Using a provided sample Python script, you can retrieve events from the Event Exporter HTTP API, modify them if necessary and push them into an external system.

Properties

Developer SensorFleet Oy
Categories Internal, Log/Event Export, Log/Event Pull
Network access type None
Required interfaces None
Dependencies None
Data retention No data is stored by the instrument.
Management UI Yes
